pages.text:
Join the Davie School Foundation and help preserve our heritage by becoming a member today.
Show someone you care by donating in their honor to the Old Davie School.
Volunteers are the heart of the Old Davie School. Get involved today by becoming a docent, volunteering for events and many more opportunities.
Executive Director
Leslie Schroeder
director@olddavieschool.org

Join the Davie School Foundation and help preserve our heritage by becoming a member today.
Show someone you care by donating in their honor to the Old Davie School.
Volunteers are the heart of the Old Davie School. Get involved today by becoming a docent, volunteering for events and many more opportunities.
